summary:
FIFA, short for Fédération Internationale de Football Association, is the world's football governing body. Founded in 1904, it now has 211 national associations as members. FIFA's home is in Zürich, Switzerland, and it organizes major tournaments like the World Cup and Women's World Cup. 

The organization aims to grow and promote football worldwide, ensuring fairness and accessibility. However, FIFA has faced corruption allegations, including bribery and vote-rigging, leading to investigations and arrests of high-ranking officials. These scandals have raised questions about FIFA's leadership and decision-making processes.
title: FIFA
